greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: E.g.f. exp(tanh(x)).
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
formula: a(n) := sum(m=1..n, sum(k=m..n, binomial(k-1,m-1)*k!*(-1)^(m+k)*2^(n-k)*Stirling2(n,k))/m!), n>0, a(0)=1. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 28 2011
mathematica: With[{nn = 30}, CoefficientList[Series[Exp[Tanh[x]], {x, 0, nn}], x] Range[0, nn]!] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 11 2014 *)
program: a(n):=if n=0 then 1 else sum(sum(binomial(k-1,m-1)*k!*(-1)^(m+k)*2^(n-k)*stirling2(n,k),k,m,n)/m!,m,1,n); /* _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 28 2011 */
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_, _Simon Plouffe_
